full_summary:
# Government of Canada Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer for Wooden Chair Components

**Reference Number**: WS3737163330
**Solicitation Number**: WS3737163330
**Amendment Number**: 2

**Tender Status**: Cancelled

### Key Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Overview

The Correctional Service of Canada has partnered with Public Works and Government Services Canada to issue a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the supply and delivery of wooden chair components.

**Scope of Work**: The successful supplier will be required to provide chair components for use by the Correctional Service of Canada.

**Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba, Alberta, Nova Scotia, Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region), Saskatchewan, British Columbia, Newfoundland and Labrador, and New Brunswick.

### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date was **2022-12-06T14:00:00**. Unfortunately, this tender has been cancelled.

### Contact Information

Contact Christopher Finnigan at (SPAC/PSPC) for more information:

* Email: [christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Website: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14628962?extsite=MTQ2Mjg5NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14628962?extsite=MTQ2Mjg5NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Technical Requirements

The technical requirements for this tender are outlined in the Request for Standing Offer and attachments, which are available for download on the SAP Ariba website.

I replaced three fully French-English texts, but kept in the equivalent ULwatermark, so you could easily compare what changed.
